name: ogdd
description: Web application for displaying results from New Zealands Open Data Maturity Surveys

scripts.doc-index: mkdir -p docs && ./node_modules/.bin/documentation build src/index.js -f md -o docs/index.md --markdown-toc false --shallow
scripts.doc-store: mkdir -p docs && ./node_modules/.bin/documentation build src/store.js -f md -o docs/store.md --markdown-toc false --shallow
scripts.doc-utils: mkdir -p docs && ./node_modules/.bin/documentation build src/utils/* -f md -o docs/utils.md --markdown-toc false --shallow
scripts.doc-actions: mkdir -p docs && ./node_modules/.bin/documentation build src/containers/App/actions.js -f md -o docs/App_actions.md --markdown-toc false --shallow
scripts.doc-reducers: mkdir -p docs && ./node_modules/.bin/documentation build src/containers/App/reducers.js -f md -o docs/App_reducers.md --markdown-toc false --shallow
scripts.doc-selectors: mkdir -p docs && ./node_modules/.bin/documentation build src/containers/App/selectors.js -f md -o docs/App_selectors.md --markdown-toc false --shallow
scripts.doc-sagas: mkdir -p docs && ./node_modules/.bin/documentation build src/containers/App/sagas.js -f md -o docs/App_sagas.md --markdown-toc false --shallow
scripts.doc-all: mkdir -p docs && npm run doc-index && npm run doc-store && npm run doc-utils && npm run doc-actions && npm run doc-reducers && npm run doc-selectors && npm run doc-sagas
scripts.doc: npm run doc-all && npm run styleguide && rm -rf docs

author: Timo Franz, Unfold Data
